title: AlexVCaron/nf-tractoflow pipeline parameters
description: Human diffusion MRI processing and tractography

input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

input.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment.
input.help_text: You will need to create a design file with information about the samples in your experiment before running the pipeline. Use this parameter to specify its location. It has to be a comma-separated file with 3 columns, and a header row.

dwi_shell_extract_tolerance.description: Consider all b-values up to +-tolerance as belonging to the same shell.

dwi_b0_extract_threshold.description: Consider all b-values below threshold as b=0 images.

clean_input_bids.description: Remove all participants that are missing any information when reading input BIDS databases.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

email.help_text: Set this parameter to your e-mail address to get a summary e-mail with details of the run sent to you when the workflow exits. If set in your user config file (`~/.nextflow/config`) then you don't need to specify this on the command line for every run.

multiqc_title.description: MultiQC report title. Printed as page header, used for filename if not otherwise specified.

institutional_config_options.title: Institutional config options
institutional_config_options.description: Parameters used to describe centralised config profiles. These should not be edited.
institutional_config_options.help_text: The centralised nf-core configuration profiles use a handful of pipeline parameters to describe themselves. This information is then printed to the Nextflow log when you run a pipeline. You should not need to change these values when you run a pipeline.

custom_config_version.description: Git commit id for Institutional configs.

custom_config_base.help_text: If you're running offline, Nextflow will not be able to fetch the institutional config files from the internet. If you don't need them, then this is not a problem. If you do need them, you should download the files from the repo and tell Nextflow where to find them with this parameter.

max_job_request_options.title: Max job request options
max_job_request_options.description: Set the top limit for requested resources for any single job.
max_job_request_options.help_text:
If you are running on a smaller system, a pipeline step requesting more resources than are available may cause the Nextflow to stop the run with an error. These options allow you to cap the maximum resources requested by any single job so that the pipeline will run on your system.

Note that you can not _increase_ the resources requested by any job using these options. For that you will need your own configuration file. See [the nf-core website](https://nf-co.re/usage/configuration) for details.

max_cpus.description: Maximum number of CPUs that can be requested for any single job.
max_cpus.help_text: Use to set an upper-limit for the CPU requirement for each process. Should be an integer e.g. `--max_cpus 1`

max_memory.description: Maximum amount of memory that can be requested for any single job.
max_memory.help_text: Use to set an upper-limit for the memory requirement for each process. Should be a string in the format integer-unit e.g. `--max_memory '8.GB'`

max_time.description: Maximum amount of time that can be requested for any single job.
max_time.help_text: Use to set an upper-limit for the time requirement for each process. Should be a string in the format integer-unit e.g. `--max_time '2.h'`

generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file.
generic_options.help_text:
These options are common to all nf-core pipelines and allow you to customise some of the core preferences for how the pipeline runs.

Typically these options would be set in a Nextflow config file loaded for all pipeline runs, such as `~/.nextflow/config`.

publish_dir_mode.description: Method used to save pipeline results to output directory.
publish_dir_mode.help_text: The Nextflow `publishDir` option specifies which intermediate files should be saved to the output directory. This option tells the pipeline what method should be used to move these files. See [Nextflow docs](https://www.nextflow.io/docs/latest/process.html#publishdir) for details.

email_on_fail.description: Email address for completion summary, only when pipeline fails.
email_on_fail.help_text: An email address to send a summary email to when the pipeline is completed - ONLY sent if the pipeline does not exit successfully.

plaintext_email.description: Send plain-text email instead of HTML.

max_multiqc_email_size.description: File size limit when attaching MultiQC reports to summary emails.

monochrome_logs.description: Do not use coloured log outputs.

hook_url.description: Incoming hook URL for messaging service
hook_url.help_text: Incoming hook URL for messaging service. Currently, MS Teams and Slack are supported.

multiqc_config.description: Custom config file to supply to MultiQC.

multiqc_logo.description: Custom logo file to supply to MultiQC. File name must also be set in the MultiQC config file

multiqc_methods_description.description: Custom MultiQC yaml file containing HTML including a methods description.

validate_params.description: Boolean whether to validate parameters against the schema at runtime

validationShowHiddenParams.help_text: By default, parameters set as _hidden_ in the schema are not shown on the command line when a user runs with `--help`. Specifying this option will tell the pipeline to show all parameters.

validationFailUnrecognisedParams.description: Validation of parameters fails when an unrecognised parameter is found.
validationFailUnrecognisedParams.help_text: By default, when an unrecognised parameter is found, it returns a warinig.

validationLenientMode.description: Validation of parameters in lenient more.
validationLenientMode.help_text: Allows string values that are parseable as numbers or booleans. For further information see [JSONSchema docs](https://github.com/everit-org/json-schema#lenient-mode).

dwi_mask_prelim_bet_dilation_radius.description: Dilation radius applied to the preliminary mask to ensure whole brain coverage.

dwi_mask_prelim_bet_f_threshold.description: Fractional Intensity threshold for preliminary brain masking.

dwi_filter_noise.description: Run background noise filtering on the DWI (Mrtrix3 dwidenoise).

dwi_noise_filter_patch_size.description: Size of the noise filtering kernel. Should at least as large as the cubic root of the number of independent directions in the dwi image.

dwi_filter_gibbs.description: Run Gibbs Ringing artifact filtering on the DWI (Mrtrix3 mrdegibbs).

dwi_filter_susceptibility.description: Run Susceptibility Distortions Filtering on the DWI (FSL Topup).

dwi_susceptibility_filter_config_file.description: Configuration file to use for Topup. Can either be a full path to a file or the name of a configuration file in Topup resources.

dwi_susceptibility_filter_output_prefix.description: Output prefix to use for susceptibility filtering output filenames.

dwi_filter_eddy_and_motion.description: Filter eddy current and attenuate patient motion on the DWI (FSL Eddy).

dwi_motion_and_eddy_filter_command.description: Command to use to run Eddy.

dwi_motion_and_eddy_filter_bet_f_thresho.description: Fractional Intensity threshold for intermediate brain masking before Motion and Eddy filtering.

dwi_motion_and_eddy_filter_restore_slice.description: Regenerate slices lost due to signal drop.

dwi_mask_final_bet_f_threshold.description: Fractional Intensity threshold for final brain masking.

dwi_intensities_normalize_fa_mask_thresh.description: Maximum FA value for a voxel to be considered for intensity normalisation.

t1_filter_noise.description: Run background noise filtering on the T1 (Dipy NL-Means)

t1_tissue_segment_n_classes.description: Number of tissue classes to estimate on the T1.

t1_template.description: Path to the template T1 directory for antsBrainExtraction. The folder must contain t1_template.nii.gz and t1_brain_probability_map.nii.gz.

dwi_resample_spatial.description: Resample DWI volumes to a finer isotropic spatial resolution before processing.

dwi_spatial_resample_resolution.description: Isotropic spatial resolution for DWI resampling.

dwi_spatial_resample_interpolation.description: Interpolation method to use for DWI resampling.

t1_resample_spatial.description: Resample T1 volumes to a finer isotropic spatial resolution before processing.

t1_spatial_resample_resolution.description: Isotropic spatial resolution for T1 resampling.

t1_spatial_resample_interpolation.description: Interpolation method to use for T1 resampling.

dwi_fit_signal_sh.description: Compute a Spherical Harmonics fit on the DWI, and output the SH coefficients in a Nifti file.

dwi_signal_sh_fit_basis.description: Spherical harmonics basis used for the signal fit.

dwi_signal_sh_fit_order.description: Spherical harmonics order for the signal fit. Must be an even number.

dwi_signal_sh_fit_shell.description: Shell to select for the signal fit. The b0 images will be extracted and concatenated to it for fitting.

dwi_dti_fit_shell_max_bvalue.description: Maximum b-value considered for the DTI fit.

dwi_dti_fit_shells.description: Shells to use for the DTI fit. List them through command line using a whitespace separated list of b-values. Overseeds other arguments setting shells.

dwi_fodf_fit_shell_min_bvalue.description: Minimum b-value considered for fODF fit (b0 shell will be preserved).

dwi_fodf_fit_shells.description: Shells to use for the fODF fit. List them through command line using a whitespace separated list of b-values. Overseeds other arguments setting shells.

dwi_fodf_fit_frf_max_fa_threshold.description: Maximum FA threshold to compute the fiber response function. Value decreases over time until the minimum threshold is reached.

dwi_fodf_fit_frf_min_fa_threshold.description: Minimum FA threshold to compute the fiber response function. An error is raised if not enough voxels are found after reaching this threshold.

dwi_fodf_fit_frf_min_n_voxels.description: Minimum acceptable number of voxels to compute a fiber response function. An error is raised if not enough voxels are found.

dwi_fodf_fit_frf_roi_radius.description: Isotropic radius of the Region Of Interest to use to compute the fiber response function.

dwi_fodf_fit_force_frf.description: Force a fiber response function. Supply as 3 values (mean b0, parallel diffusivity, perpendicular diffusivity). List it through command line using a whitespace separated list.

dwi_fodf_fit_use_average_frf.description: Average the fiber response function over inputs. USE ONLY IF ALL OF SUBJECTS COME FROM THE SAME SCANNER AND ADHERE TO THE SAME ACQUISITION PROTOCOL.

dwi_fodf_fit_order.description: Spherical harmonics order for the fODF fit. Must be an even number.

dwi_fodf_fit_basis.description: Spherical harmonics basis used for the signal fit.

dwi_fodf_fit_peaks_absolute_factor.description: Multiplicative factor to threshold fODF peaks by amplitude, compared to values obtained in ventricles.

dwi_fodf_fit_peaks_relative_threshold.description: Relative fODF peak amplitude threshold, a a ratio of the largest local peak.

dwi_fodf_fit_peaks_ventricle_max_fa.description: Maximum FA threshold for a voxel to be considered inside ventricules.

dwi_fodf_fit_peaks_ventricle_min_md.description: Minimum MD threshold for a voxel to be considered inside ventricules.

fodf_pft_fit_random_seed.description: List of seed numbers for the random number generator. List them through command line using a whitespace separated list of seeds.

fodf_pft_fit_theta_max_deviation.description: Maximum angular deviation between steps in degrees.

fodf_pft_fit_seeding_type.description: Type of seeding mask to compute.

fodf_pft_fit_seeding_strategy.description: Number of seeds initiated per voxel (npv) or globally (nt).

fodf_pft_fit_seeding_n_seeds.description: Number of seeds to use, given the seeding strategy.

fodf_pft_fit_seeding_fa_mask_threshold.description: Minimum FA threshold when seeding in FA.

fodf_pft_fit_filter_n_particles.description: Number of particles propagated in case of premature termination.

fodf_pft_fit_filter_backward_step_size.description: Length of the backtracking steps of the particle filter in mm.

fodf_pft_fit_filter_forward_step_size.description: Length of the forward tracking steps of the particle filter in mm.

fodf_pft_fit_sf_threshold.description: Threshold on spherical functions computed from fODF.

fodf_pft_fit_sf_initial_threshold.description: Initial threshold on spherical functions computed from fODF.

fodf_pft_fit_compress_max_displacement.description: Maximum point displacement allowed when compressing.

fodf_local_fit_processor.description: Type of processor to use, either CPU or GPU (using OpenCL).

fodf_local_fit_gpu_batch_size.description: Approximate size of GPU batches (number of streamlines to track in parallel).

fodf_local_fit_random_seed.description: List of seed numbers for the random number generator. List them through command line using a whitespace separated list of seeds.

fodf_local_fit_step_size.description: Length between tracking steps in mm.

fodf_local_fit_theta_max_deviation.description: Maximum angular deviation between steps in degrees.

fodf_local_fit_seeding_type.description: Type of seeding mask to compute.

fodf_local_fit_seeding_strategy.description: Number of seeds initiated per voxel (npv) or globally (nt).

fodf_local_fit_seeding_n_seeds.description: Number of seeds to use, given the seeding strategy.

fodf_local_fit_seeding_fa_threshold.description: Minimum FA threshold when seeding in FA.

fodf_local_fit_tracking_mask_type.description: Type of tracking mask to compute.

fodf_local_fit_tracking_mask_fa_threshol.description: Minimum FA threshold when tracking in FA.

fodf_local_fit_sf_threshold.description: Threshold on spherical functions computed from fODF.

fodf_local_fit_sf_initial_threshold.description: Initial threshold on spherical functions computed from fODF.

fodf_local_fit_compress_max_displacement.description: Maximum point displacement allowed when compressing.

allocation_cpu_max_bet.description: Number of processes for T1 brain extraction.

allocation_cpu_max_dwi_filter_noise.description: Number of processes for DWI denoising.

allocation_cpu_max_dwi_filter_motion_and.description: Number of processes for Eddy and motion filtering.

allocation_cpu_max_dwi_fit_fodf.description: Number of processes for fODF fitting.

allocation_cpu_max_fodf_fit_local.description: Number of processes for local tractography.

allocation_cpu_max_t1_filter_noise.description: Number of processes for T1 denoising

allocation_cpu_max_t1_registration.description: Number of processes for registration task
